html:
11.21.21  8:56 pm   have u ever made a melody and arrangement to existing poetry / not lyrics,

     yes

     for example i just read "do not go gentle into that good night" and i couldn't do it without hearing a new song

11.21.21  8:26 pm   Do you journal?

      i am journal

11.21.21  5:59 pm   Were you going to quit or was that a joke?

      i've never made any joke or plan about quitting anything

11.21.21  4:04 pm   What would you say your music genre is

      wouldn't say, but if you make me pick i'd have to say regular. if someone's going to deliberately try to shrink my target market, it's not gonna be me

11.21.21  2:58 pm   how long did it take you to learn 3d animation?

      would take too long. mostly gonna have to skip it

11.21.21  2:55 pm   why do i stutter

      maybe your mind is overwhelmed with the millions of possible ways you could say things

11.21.21  1:57 pm   what's better than sliced bread

      diced bread

11.21.21  1:56 pm   which of the multiple instruments that you play do you think you are best at?

      fretting

11.21.21  1:00 pm   Do you know calculus 

      no

11.21.21  12:57 pm   How did you learn to make the rhythmic patterns in more than a dream?

      i'm not sure. i've learned most of that stuff a long time ago. if there's anything rhythmically brand new in that song, then it would be just a result of ongoing creativity, which i've been practicing for a long time also, although it is ever changing

11.21.21  11:32 am   how do you feel about the amount of time you spend animating compared to recording songs?

      pretty good. the sum total of both is what concerns me

11.21.21  10:14 am   i think its pretty unfair that youre always answering everyones questions but no one ever answers yours. to that end i did some research and it turns out that windmills get faster when the wind gets faster but if the wind gets too fast the windmills slow down so they dont break. therefore the answer to "when did all the windmills start to turn so slow" is probably either "when it got too windy" or "when it stopped being windy". hope that helps

      you're assuming that they were turning faster before. is there not another possible context where it could be assumed that they were previously not spinning at all

11.21.21  9:49 am   Is the world a simulation of the world?

      sure but wouldn't that make it the real thing

11.21.21  5:36 am   Why do I like the number 59

      maybe because 1003 is a multiple of it. that's the reason i like it

11.21.21  5:31 am   Thoughts on Pakistan 

      there used to be 2 pakistans and they both used to be india

11.21.21  4:34 am   what is your favourite type of drink? 

      water

11.21.21  2:16 am   I recently bought a car. Where should I drive it?

      around the world, if possible

11.21.21  2:00 am   i have become so withdrawn and distant and mysterious that i have become distant and mysterious to myself. i dont know how to fix it

      how about getting a job as a package delivery driver

11.21.21  1:05 am   What was the inspiration behind the question about everything being dumb and stupid that everyone asks Damien Maymdien?

      every line of that video is inspired by the sum total of the play-through of the video up until that point

11.20.21  11:01 pm   is it too much to hope for the next song to be uploaded before the year ends???

     how do you think i feel

     if not, that's cool too, a new song to kick off the next year would be great

      i prefer a liquid kick, that saturates throughout the entire year equally

11.20.21  10:48 pm   I have a question

      well you came to the right place

11.20.21  10:34 pm   What is the key in your next song?

      A and Amin, then Dmin for a while

11.20.21  10:31 pm   why are you so deep

      whatever gets the job done

11.20.21  9:49 pm   favorite song u made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.20.21  5:44 pm   were you telling the truth when you said "this is my favorite part of the video" in here comes the sun?

      no, that was an attempt to distract

11.20.21  5:39 pm   whats your favorite number or letter?

      i

11.20.21  4:54 pm   tell me a joke

      every time i try to tell a joke i end up accidentally telling the truth

11.20.21  1:26 pm   so... what's your deal with postmen?

      they are right at that sweetspot, where something seems familiar and normal when you see it in a storybook, despite being almost completely obsolete in real life

11.20.21  10:41 am   what is your goal in life? or rather, what are your goals in life?

      try to solve the universe, which oddly enough actually creates more puzzles

11.20.21  10:11 am   new sgon when

      doing it now

11.20.21  8:42 am   WHY DO SLASH CHORDS EXISTS?????? why cant they just say how every note relates to the root (C/E should be Eminb6(no5), etc)

      it seems like if there's 11 characters in a chord symbol, everyone is gonna have a bad time

11.20.21  8:51 am   How long is the next song?

      3:11

11.20.21  6:00 am   why are you so weird 

      that's a side effect of being normal

11.20.21  3:58 am   how did you find your purpose?

      it find me, but then it plays hard to get so i have to chase it

11.20.21  12:26 am   1 week schedule?

      that sounds lovely

11.19.21  11:41 pm   In the event of a zombie apocalypse, what would you do?

      begin selling zombie apocalypse themed merchandise

11.19.21  11:33 pm   what is the best number 

      no number is best. the point of every number is for another number to be better

11.19.21  10:28 pm   in your music video "here comes the sun", at 1:12, why are you wearing an Egyptian hat

      made sense at the time

11.19.21  8:02 pm   do you have a favorite font?

      i like the font to be chosen for me. i prefer not to choose the font. i prefer to put all my creative energy into choosing the letters and words

11.19.21  7:44 pm   Hi this is school what do you wish to learn

      how to tame my brain

11.19.21  5:33 pm   what do i do when i have a lot of explaining to do

      explain everything, just to be on the safe side

11.19.21  6:31 pm   How would you spell the word for if you are amplifying something with a microphone? Micing? Miking? Micking?

     micing

     Those all look wrong to me. But I don't know. 

     yes, i've been panicing about that too

11.19.21  6:10 pm   who inspires you throughout your creative journeys?

      anyone. maybe you can

11.19.21  5:40 pm   Do you find Physics interesting? 

      yes

11.19.21  2:46 pm   why is my brain always Thinking

      it's on

11.19.21  2:18 pm   what software do you use to compose?

      none

11.19.21  2:13 pm   spelling tips?

      just put all the letters in exactly the same place

11.19.21  11:05 am   what happened to the alien babies that you got pregnant with in your song "outside"??

      fake

11.19.21  9:13 am   If you could rename a chord, what would it be and what's its new name

      "Eb add4 over C", in my own charts i sometimes call that C-☆

11.19.21  6:58 am   In your song "more than a dream", I know you reference the kind of dreams you have while you're sleeping but could the song also be about the other definition of "dream"?

      yes
